items.sentence: My brother and I don't get along with each other.
Stay here until I tell you that it's OK to leave.
Some of my students turn in their homework early.
I was kind of hoping we wouldn't have to do this.
I don't want to do that, but I think that I will.
There's little hope that Tom will get any better.
I got fined for parking in front of fire hydrant.
I saw a couple of crazy men fighting in the park.
Almost everyone there thought it was a good idea.
Nearly everyone there thought it was a good idea.
The problem is that I don't have any money on me.
I can't wait to see what you're going to do next.
That's a topic I think I could write a lot about.
My father disapproved of my going to the concert.
That building over there is owned by our company.
Please remember everything I've told you tonight.
Tom's parents forced him to call off the wedding.
I seldom eat dessert, but Tom almost always does.
I want you to get rid of everything in this room.
You'll never be able to sell that for that price.
It'll be hard to convince Tom to sell that horse.
I couldn't help overhearing what Tom said to you.
Tom thought a trip by automobile was a good idea.
When was the last time you played cards with Tom?
Neither Tom nor Mary has to go back to Australia.
I don't have to go to Australia until next month.
I'm not sure if Tom is still in Australia or not.
I don't want to spend any more time in Australia.
Tom dreamt that Mary was trying to discredit him.
They hope this time things will work out for you.
I hope these boots last longer than my last pair.
I hope Tom can actually do what he says he'll do.
How many hours a day do you spend in the kitchen?
Let's not spend any more time talking about this.
This concert was better than I expected it to be.
Do you remember the first time that I kissed you?
Tom made a mistake, but I know he won't admit it.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been told what happened.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been to another country.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been teaching very long.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been released from jail.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been here all afternoon.
It took Tom a long time to find the light switch.
It looks like Tom is unable to solve the problem.
I've forgotten almost all the French I ever knew.
Tom opened his desk drawer and took out a pencil.
Tom offered no explanation as to why he did that.
Tom is going to be lonely now that Mary has gone.
Tom is going to be eligible for parole next year.
Tom is drinking something, but I'm not sure what.
Tom is a student at the same school Mary goes to.
Tom has borrowed a lot of money from many people.
Tom has a son named Tom and a grandson named Tom.
Tom forgot to tell Mary what she needed to bring.
Tom fell asleep while waiting at a traffic light.
Tom doesn't know where he'll be living next year.
Tom didn't want to drive, but Mary wanted him to.
Tom didn't want Mary to see his passport picture.
Tom didn't tell Mary where he planned to do that.
Tom didn't tell Mary how he planned to get there.
Tom didn't say what time he planned to get there.
Tom couldn't remember where he hid the documents.
Tom could've handled the problem in a better way.
Tom was the first person to volunteer to help us.
Tom was standing on the bridge, whistling a tune.
Tom was caught driving well over the speed limit.
Tom should've dealt with the problem differently.
Tom should be allowed to go to Boston by himself.
Tom said that he couldn't remember what happened.
Tom refused to tell Mary what she wanted to know.
Tom really wants to know what you want him to do.
Tom would've done that if Mary hadn't been there.
Tom woke Mary up earlier than usual this morning.
Tom will be heading to Boston after this meeting.
Tom went to Boston and brought his children home.
Tom went into the pub and ordered a pint of beer.
Tom wasn't aware of what was happening in Boston.
Tom is in the garden, and Mary is in the kitchen.
You can get a hold of Tom by calling this number.
Tom bought everyone in the bar a round of drinks.
In this area, all of us only drink bottled water.
Tom drank a glass of white wine, and so did Mary.
Tom ordered a drink for himself and one for Mary.
Your way of doing that is much better than Tom's.
What I want is for you to tell me how to do that.
What I want is for Tom to admit that he did that.
We need to reduce our dependence on fossil fuels.
Tom still hopes that he'll be allowed to do that.
I hope that both Tom and Mary get what they want.
There's still no French translation of this book.
Tom's ex-wife wants to ruin his new relationship.
Does anybody have a logical explanation for this?
The church is midway between your house and mine.
Tom suggested I stay in Boston for another month.
I didn't pay any attention to what Tom was doing.
Tom told his son getting a tattoo was a bad idea.
It's a good thing that Tom was there to help you.
I'm glad that you were able to do that yesterday.
I don't want to do anything that would upset Tom.
Mary is cute, but I don't think she's very smart.
